description:
When the conditions put your map a risk, protect it. The TPU Guide Map Case is a light and flexible way to protect your map, while keeping it easy to read. Made from supple, welded TPU, you can fold or roll this map case, making it easy to stow when not needed.

  • Lash loops at the corners to attach to the deck of your kayak
  • TPU construction is durable, flexible, stands up well to UV, and won’t freeze or crack in cold weather
  • Ziploc® closure is familiar and easy to use
  • Welded construction seals the outside out
  • Individually tested to be waterproof and dustproof before leaving Sea To Summit
name: Sea To Summit TPU Guide Map Case
